title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Bases in Lebanon: A Detailed Report on Recent Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked military buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory; fighter jets attacked the launch site from which launches were made to Golan Heights.

In recent hours, fighter jets attacked military buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization in the area of ​​Ayta al-Shaab in southern Lebanon.

In addition, a short time ago, the fighter jets attacked the launch site in the Kaoukaba area, from which dozens of launches were made a few hours ago towards the Golan Heights area.

Earlier today, an IDF tank attacked another military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in the village of Kila.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3UWF93I
